landing.msg_create_wallet_notice_0: On the following screen, you will see a set of 12 random words, This is your wallet's Backup Phrase. You can use this to restore your wallet. We don't save any data to restore on our server.
landing.msg_create_wallet_notice_1: Be sure to store your Backup Phrase in a secure place. If you do not record or lose your recovery words, you will not be able to recover your Hdac wallet and your funds when you delete the app or initialize data.
landing.msg_create_wallet_notice_2: Select the check box and press the Ok to confirm the Backup Phrase.

loading.msg_sync: Synchronizing your wallet now. It might take a few minutes.

main.low_fee_alert: *Low fee amount might cause transfer delay.
main.msg_timeout: No server response. Move to initial page.
main.msg_tx_fail: Fail to send. Please retry again.
main.msg_tx_fail_insufficient_fee: Fail to send. Please check transaction fee.
main.msg_tx_amount_over_balance: The transfer value is more than your balance.
main.msg_send_confirm: Do you want to send? You cannot cancel transaction after it is sent.
main.msg_reset_wallet1: Did you record the Backup Phrases?
main.msg_reset_wallet2: Without Backup Phrases, Wallet recovery is not possible after initialization. Please make sure you have recorded the Backup Phrases again.
main.msg_reset_wallet3: Do you really want to reset your wallet?
main.msg_understand: Yes, I want to reset my wallet.
